data.title: United States of Americana for April 21, 2013
data.meta_description: Featured a couple from Glen Campbell on the latest USofA. He turns 77 tomorrow.
data.text:
Featured a couple from Glen Campbell on the latest USofA. He turns 77 tomorrow.

Also had the usual dose of new Americana and the Vintage Vinyl track was Roy Clark, who turned 80 this past week!
